product_name: Pearl Izumi Streak II Road-Running Shoes - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight with seamless uppers and comfy cushioning, the Pearl Izumi Streak II women's road-running shoes feature a sleek, low-profile fit while being supportive enough for for your distance days. Seamless woven polyester mesh uppers offer a fantastic, flexible fit with excellent breathability; thermoplastic urethane overlays offer support and structure. Washable, removable OrthoLite(R) foam insoles supply amazing step-in comfort and long-lasting cushioning. EVA midsoles use Energy Foam for shock absorption and energy return; thermoplastic urethane medial shanks provide support and stability. Outsoles use a combination of EVA and blown rubber in the forefoot and heel for durable, reliable traction. The Pearl Izumi Streak II women's road-running shoes are built on the Pearl Izumi racing-shoe last for a snug fit. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight with seamless uppers and comfy cushioning, the Pearl Izumi Streak II women's road-running shoes feature a sleek, low-profile fit while being supportive enough for for your distance days.
